trans-unit.source: title: Step 4: Create a Windows virtual machine from an .iso file
trans-unit.target: title: Step 4: Create a Windows virtual machine from an .iso file

trans-unit.source: Step 4: Create a Windows virtual machine from an .iso file
trans-unit.target: Step 4: Create a Windows virtual machine from an .iso file

trans-unit.source: For this step, if you already have a .iso file for a supported 64-bit operating system, you can use that.
trans-unit.target: For this step, if you already have a .iso file for a supported 64-bit operating system, you can use that.

trans-unit.source: If not, you can download the .iso for [Windows 8.1 Enterprise](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/evalcenter/evaluate-windows-8-1-enterprise) and choose the 64-bit edition.
trans-unit.target: If not, you can download the .iso for [Windows 8.1 Enterprise](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/evalcenter/evaluate-windows-8-1-enterprise) and choose the 64-bit edition.

trans-unit.source: In Hyper-V Manager, click on the **Action** menu > **New** > **Virtual machine**.
trans-unit.target: In Hyper-V Manager, click on the **Action** menu > **New** > **Virtual machine**.

trans-unit.source: In the virtual machine wizard, make the following choices:
trans-unit.target: In the virtual machine wizard, make the following choices:

trans-unit.source:
Startup Memory:
PageEntry
Name:Type in Windows Walkthrough VM
Generation:Generation 2
1024 and leave dynamic memory selected
Configure Networking:External (this is the virtual switch you created in Step 3)
Connect virtual hard disk:Create a virtual hard disk (keep the other default values)
Installation Options:Install an operating system from a bootable CD/DVD-ROM.
trans-unit.target:
Startup Memory:
PageEntry
Name:Type in Windows Walkthrough VM
Generation:Generation 2
1024 and leave dynamic memory selected
Configure Networking:External (this is the virtual switch you created in Step 3)
Connect virtual hard disk:Create a virtual hard disk (keep the other default values)
Installation Options:Install an operating system from a bootable CD/DVD-ROM.

trans-unit.source: Under Media, select Image file (iso) and then click Browse to point to the .iso file.
trans-unit.target: Under Media, select Image file (iso) and then click Browse to point to the .iso file.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** If you only have 32-bit version of Windows, you need to choose Generation 1 in the **Generation** section of the wizard.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** If you only have 32-bit version of Windows, you need to choose Generation 1 in the **Generation** section of the wizard.

trans-unit.source: Generation 2 VMs only support 64-bit operating systems.
trans-unit.target: Generation 2 VMs only support 64-bit operating systems.

trans-unit.source: [Step 5: Connect to the virtual machine and finish the installation](walkthrough_vmconnect.md)
trans-unit.target: [Step 5: Connect to the virtual machine and finish the installation](walkthrough_vmconnect.md)
